page.title: 18Credits, St. John's School.
page.content:
Dear Reader, This{tailpiece}is just to tell you how much we've enjoyed taking part in this project. In all our trips out we have had great fun learning about our environment. We wonder what kind of machine you are using to read this text. We doubt it's a BBC model B 32k computer similar to the one we used for this project.
Signed: {Caroline Baillie, Richard {Biscoe, Sarah Bouchere, Paul Brennan, {Lauren Crawford, Paul Herridge, Wendy {Hewlett, Xavier Jegat, Debbie Le Brun, {Andrew Malzard, Aaron Masefield, Sarah {Poisson, Iain Rogers and Darren Vibert (all aged 11 years);{Katherine Dixon, {Claire Fauvel, Mark Richard, Jonathan {Scott and Kerrie Vautier}(all aged 10 years);{Mr.David Rogers}(class teacher).
